an8.29:4.1: “‘Khaṇakicco loko, khaṇakicco loko’ti, bhikkhave, assutavā puthujjano bhāsati, no ca kho so jānāti khaṇaṃ vā akkhaṇaṃ vā*.
an8.29:4.4: Idha, bhikkhave, tathāgato ca loke uppanno hoti arahaṃ sammāsambuddho vijjācaraṇasampanno sugato lokavidū anuttaro purisadammasārathi satthā devamanussānaṃ buddho bhagavā, dhammo ca desiyati opasamiko parinibbāniko sambodhagāmī sugatappavedito;
an8.29:4.6: Ayaṃ, bhikkhave, paṭhamo akkhaṇo asamayo brahmacariyavāsāya. (1)
an8.29:5.1: Puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, tathāgato ca loke uppanno hoti … pe …
an8.29:5.2: satthā devamanussānaṃ buddho bhagavā, dhammo ca desiyati opasamiko parinibbāniko sambodhagāmī sugatappavedito;
an8.29:5.3: ayañca puggalo tiracchānayoniṃ upapanno hoti … pe ….
an8.29:6.2: ayañca puggalo pettivisayaṃ upapanno hoti … pe ….
an8.29:7.2: ayañca puggalo aññataraṃ dīghāyukaṃ devanikāyaṃ upapanno hoti … pe ….
an8.29:8.2: ayañca puggalo paccantimesu janapadesu paccājāto hoti, so ca hoti aviññātāresu milakkhesu, yattha natthi gati bhikkhūnaṃ bhikkhunīnaṃ upāsakānaṃ upāsikānaṃ … pe ….
an8.29:9.2: ayañca puggalo majjhimesu janapadesu paccājāto hoti, so ca hoti micchādiṭṭhiko viparītadassano:
an8.29:9.3: ‘natthi dinnaṃ, natthi yiṭṭhaṃ, natthi hutaṃ, natthi sukatadukkaṭānaṃ kammānaṃ phalaṃ vipāko, natthi ayaṃ loko, natthi paro loko, natthi mātā, natthi pitā, natthi sattā opapātikā, natthi loke samaṇabrāhmaṇā sammaggatā sammā paṭipannā ye imañca lokaṃ parañca lokaṃ sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā pavedentī’ti … pe ….
an8.29:10.2: ayañca puggalo majjhimesu janapadesu paccājāto hoti, so ca hoti duppañño jaḷo eḷamūgo appaṭibalo subhāsitadubbhāsitassa atthamaññātuṃ.
an8.29:10.3: Ayaṃ, bhikkhave, sattamo akkhaṇo asamayo brahmacariyavāsāya. (7)
an8.29:11.1: Puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, tathāgato ca loke anuppanno hoti arahaṃ sammāsambuddho … pe …
an8.29:11.3: Dhammo ca na desiyati opasamiko parinibbāniko sambodhagāmī sugatappavedito.
an8.29:11.4: Ayañca puggalo majjhimesu janapadesu paccājāto hoti, so ca hoti paññavā ajaḷo aneḷamūgo paṭibalo subhāsitadubbhāsitassa atthamaññātuṃ.
an8.29:11.5: Ayaṃ, bhikkhave, aṭṭhamo akkhaṇo asamayo brahmacariyavāsāya. (8)
an8.29:12.1: Ime kho, bhikkhave, aṭṭha akkhaṇā asamayā brahmacariyavāsāya.
an8.29:13.1: Ekova kho, bhikkhave, khaṇo ca samayo ca brahmacariyavāsāya.
an8.29:13.3: Idha, bhikkhave, tathāgato ca loke uppanno hoti arahaṃ sammāsambuddho vijjācaraṇasampanno sugato lokavidū anuttaro purisadammasārathi satthā devamanussānaṃ buddho bhagavā.
an8.29:13.4: Dhammo ca desiyati opasamiko parinibbāniko sambodhagāmī sugatappavedito.
an8.29:13.5: Ayañca puggalo majjhimesu janapadesu paccājāto hoti, so ca hoti paññavā ajaḷo aneḷamūgo paṭibalo subhāsitadubbhāsitassa atthamaññātuṃ.
an8.29:13.6: Ayaṃ, bhikkhave, ekova khaṇo ca samayo ca brahmacariyavāsāyāti.
an8.29:16.6: attakāmena jantunā.

an8.29:22.3: Tesu gutto sadā sato,
an8.29:23.3: Te ve pāraṅgatā loke,
